entry: << Bards College ancient school of the bardic arts, one of most prestigious in all of Tamriel>>>> << Bards College founded some time in the First Era, bard school art school>>>>
<< Bards College current leader Grandmaster Armilion>>>> << Bards College most of the best bards in Tamriel graduated here>>>> << Bards College located in the city of Solitude>>>>

<< Antiquarian Circle school of archaeology paleontology history, located in city of Solitude>>>> << Antiquarian Circle is a branch of Gwyllim University>> << Antiquarian Circle current leader breton she Dean Desirée Beauclair>>>>
<< Antiquarian Circle many of the best historians and archaeologists have graduated here>>>> << Antiquarian Circle founded some time in the First Era>>>>
<< College of Winterhold school of magic, located in city of Winterhold>>>> << College of Winterhold current leader she breton Arch-Mage Mélanie Sindeaux>>>>
<< College of Winterhold founded in First Era by Shalidor>>>> << College of Winterhold many powerful mages graduated here>>>>
<< Companions ancient group of fighters, headquarter in meadhall called Jorrvaskr, do jobs for money>>>> << Companions protect citizens, current leader Harbinger Isenor Argonsson>>>>
<< Thieves Guild organization in favor of thieves, worship Nocturnal, leader is the Gray Fox>>>> << Thieves Guild located The Ratways in Riften, steals from rich gives to poor, helps beggars>>>>
